title: #92: Male Sexual Victimization with Sword and Scale's Mike Boudet
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome Sword and Scale host Mike Boudet to the show. They discuss overlooked male victims of predators and review Jim's interview about his own experiences.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime

Listen to Sword and Scale and subscribe today at http://swordandscale.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
